column1: Les différentes parties du paragraphe (£ pour un retour à la ligne)
Hello, this is Lucy Ferrant from the Wide Sky Retirement Home, based at Joytown, LQ. £Postal Code: 68500, ID#46542.£

£We’ve had a report abound an abnormal change in the moral state of one of our patients, Ms.Graham Donna, 73, which went under a mood drop above the medium moral state change observed for residents with those kinds of profiles.£

£Apparently, she reached you for some kind of counseling, without any links to her current psychoanalysis and care by our services. We would have appreciated being informed of those kinds of actions, as Ms.Graham is one of our residents.£

£We do not condone your company, nor it’s methods. We do not question either Dear Incorporated’s expertise on many subjects. However, we would like you to not make further approaches to our clients, as they are already under a close following by our teams.££Salutations.
